definitions.body: kinsman of Naomi, who married Ruth Ru 2:1, Ru 2:3, Ru 2:4, Ru 2:5, Ru 2:8, Ru 2:11, Ru 2:14, Ru 2:15, Ru 2:19, Ru 2:23, Ru 3:2, Ru 3:7, Ru 4:1, Ru 4:1, Ru 4:5, Ru 4:8, Ru 4:9, Ru 4:13, also v:Ru 4:21, v:Ru 4:21, 1Ch 2:11, 1Ch 2:12 (LXX Boov, Booz).
name of the left hand of two pillars set up before temple (cf. also [[יׇכִין]] sub [[כון]]) 1Ki 7:21 = 2Ch 3:17; (mng. obscure; MT appar. ref. to

, cf. Targum 2Ch 3:17; Thes supposes name of architect or donor; Ew perh. sons of Solomon, etc.; rd. possibly [[בְּעׂז]] in strength, LXX 2Ch 3:17 i)sxu/v; Th thinks [[יכין בעז]] a sentence, one word being engraved on each pillar, he (God) establisheth in strength; against him, however, Ke Be; Öt thinks an exclamation, in strength ! expressing satisfaction of architect; Klo prop. for [[בעז]], [[בַּעַל עׂז]] (cf. B 1Ki 7:21 Balaz)).
